translated: Stories of Departed Ones
The Great Chapter🔽The Story of the Departed One, the Prince
The result of deeds done in the past
overwhelmed my mind;
In forms, sounds, tastes, smells,
and delightful touches.
I enjoyed dancing, singing, and play,
to an inordinate degree;
I roamed in the pleasure garden,
entering the city of Giribbaja.
I saw the sage Sunetta,
self-controlled, concentrated;
Content with little, full of shame,
delighting in the alms he received.

analyzed: hatthi kkhandhataḥ oruyha  laddhā bhantā iti ca abravi
translated: Descending from the elephant's back,🔽I said, I've come, venerable sir!

analyzed: tassa pattam gahetvāna  uccam paggayha khattiyaḥ
translated: Taking his bowl,🔽the noble one held it high.
Breaking the bowl on a rock,
I left, laughing;
I'm the king's son, a prince,
what can you do to me, monk?
The result of that harsh deed
was bitter;
What the prince experienced
was being brought to hell.

analyzed: chaḷ eva catuḥ asi iti  vassāni navutāni ca
translated: For sixty-four years and nine,
I suffered great pain,
The evil he did in hell.
He was also reborn as a man,
a hunchback, left-handed,
Standing with his foot on his head,

analyzed: ciram bālaḥ apaccatha  bahūni vassa sahassāni
translated: The fool was reborn for a long time.🔽For many thousands of years,
In groups and in hundreds of thousands,
He went through much suffering,
The evil he did in hell.
Such is the bitter fruit
Of the evil done by the one who is not at peace.
The evildoers are roasted
In the Simbalī hell.

analyzed: saḥ tattha bahu vassāni  vedayitvā bahum
translated: There he experienced much suffering🔽For many years.
He was reborn as a hungry ghost named Khuppipása.
When he died from there,

analyzed: etam ādīnavam ñatvā  issara mada sambhava
translated: Knowing this danger,🔽Arising from pride in sovereignty,
Abandoning pride in sovereignty,
One should follow the one who is restrained.
There is praise right here in this life
For one who has respect for the Buddhas;
When the body breaks up, the one with discernment
Is reborn in heaven.
The Story of the Ghost of the Prince’s Son is the seventh.
